name: Pew Pew Factory - Doom-like Infinite FPS
name_original: Pew Pew Factory - Doom-like Infinite FPS
description:
Info

Play in a factory, an infinite FPS game!

Made under 48 hours for a video!

Developed by DevNugget on Youtube!

Controls

Movement - W, A, S, D

Shoot - Left Mouse Button

X - weew wiw woove woov wiw wiw
